sen.j: 川島は幕末太陽傳での製作にかかる予算配分を巡って日活と対立し、結局日活を去った。
sen.e: KAWASHIMA conflicted with Nikkatsu over budget allocation for production of Bakumatsu Taiyo den: The sun in the end of edo period, and left Nikkatsu.
sen.cmt: 幕末太陽傳→幕末太陽伝（セルB 26）と判断し訳出しました。一原文・一訳文の例外対処。
sen.e: KAWASHIMA conflicted with Nikkatsu over the budget allocation for production of "Bakumatsu Taiyo den: The sun at the end of Edo period", and left Nikkatsu.
sen.cmt: 表現を変更しました。
sen.e: Kawashima clashed with Nikkatsu over the budget allocation for "Bakamatsu taiyo den", and ended up leaving Nikkatsu over the dispute.
sen.cmt: FBに基づき修正しました

sen.j: 今村は日活に残り、『にっぽん昆虫記』、『赤い殺意』などの製作を行なう。
sen.e: IMAMURA stayed in Nikkatsyu, and produced films including "Nippon Konchu ki: Record of Japanese Insects", "Akai Satsui: Red Intention to Kill."
sen.cmt: 一原文・一訳文の例外対処。
sen.e: IMAMURA stayed at Nikkatsyu, and produced films including "Nippon Konchu ki: Record of Japanese Insects" and "Akai Satsui: Red Intention to Kill."
sen.cmt: 表現を変更しました。
sen.e: Imamura, however, remained at Nikkatsu, going on to make several more films including "Nippon konchu ki" and "Akai satsui."
sen.cmt: FBに基づき修正しました

sen.j: 今村は常に川島を意識して、東北土着の「基層心理」をベースにした作風（本人の言葉で言えば重喜劇）をこのとき確立させた。
sen.e: IMAMURA was always aware of KAWASHIMA, and he established his style that was based on `underlying psychology' which was indigenous Tohoku area (heavy comedy according to his words).
sen.cmt: 一原文・一訳文の例外対処。基層心理→underlying phsychorogyと訳出しました。
sen.e: IMAMURA was always aware of KAWASHIMA, and he established his style based on `underlying psychology' which was indigenous to the Tohoku area (heavy comedy according to his words).
sen.cmt: 表現を変更しました。
sen.e: Imamura always showed an awareness of Kawashima's work, establishing his own style based on the Tohoku region's 'underlying psychology' (which in Imamura's own words was "heavy comedy").
sen.cmt: FBに基づき修正しました

sen.j: のちに今村はこの基層心理を推し進めてドキュメントタッチの作風に変化して行った。
sen.e: IMAMURA subsequently developed the underlying psychology into the style with a documentary touch.
sen.cmt: 一原文・一訳文の例外対処。
sen.e: IMAMURA subsequently developed the underlying psychology into the style with a documentary-like touch.
sen.cmt: 表現を変更しました。
sen.e: Imamura subsequently adapted this idea of underlying psychology to create a style with a documentary-like touch.
sen.cmt: FBに基づき修正しました

sen.j: 主人公は常に庶民であり、有名人の故事来歴的作品は一切取り上げなかった。
sen.e: The main characters of his films are always common people, and he never worked on a celebrity's origin and history.
sen.cmt: 一原文・一訳文の例外対処。
sen.e: The main characters of his films are always common people, and he never worked on a film dealing with the origin or history of a celebrity.
sen.cmt: 表現を変更しました。
sen.e: The main characters of his films are invariably ordinary people; never once did he work on a film that dealt with the origins or history of a famous person.
sen.cmt: FBに基づき修正しました

sen.j: 彼の師匠川島雄三についての追悼録、『サヨナラだけが人生だ 映画監督川島雄三の生涯』では、川島の生涯を実証的に取り上げ、川島が筋萎縮性側索硬化症に侵されながらそれを一切他言せず、最後まで映画製作の現場に立っていたことを取り上げた。
sen.e: In the memorial record: "The life is to just say goodbye, The life of the film director, Yuzo KAWASHIMA" on his teacher, Yuzo KAWASHIMA, he followed his Teacher's life in a documentary way; he described on the book that KAWASHIMA kept working at the filming location until his last without telling others anything about Lou Gehrig's disease he was suffering from.

In the memorial record: "Life is to just say goodbye, The life of the film director, Yuzo KAWASHIMA" about his teacher, Yuzo KAWASHIMA, he followed his Teacher's life in a documentary style; he described in the book that KAWASHIMA kept working at the filming location until the end without telling anyone that he was suffering from Lou Gehrig's disease.
sen.cmt: 表現を変更しました。
sen.e: In the memorial record he created about and in memory of his mentor, Yuzo KAWASHIMA, entitled "Sayonara dake ga jinsei da: Eiga kantoku Kawashima Yuzo no shogai" (Life is only a chorus of goodbyes: the life of director Yuzo KAWASHIMA), he chronicled Kawashima's life using a documentary style; in it, he recounted how Kawashima kept working right on to the end, filming on location without breathing a single word to anyone that he was suffering from Lou Gehrig's disease.
sen.cmt: FBに基づき修正しました

sen.j: これ以降、川島ファンが映画通の間で一勢力を築くが、その最初は今村のこの著作であったといえる。
sen.e: Ever since then, it has been the fans of KAWASHIMA who formulated a major stream among film lovers; the beginning of the stream was this book.
Ever since then, it has been the fans of KAWASHIMA who have been a major group among film lovers; the beginning was this book.
sen.cmt: 表現を変更しました。
sen.e: Since publication, Kawashima fans have become a major force among cinephiles, and it could well be said that Imamura's book was their impetus.
sen.cmt: FBに基づき修正しました

sen.j: 世界的な巨匠でありながらも今村の作品には『うなぎ』も含め多くの作品で女優のヌードシーンが登場している。
